entry.title: Ukraine President Foresees 'New Stage of Terror' as Russia Steps Up Strikes Near Kyiv
entry.content: The intensified missile strikes and bombings came as Russia repositioned its ground forces for what was expected to be a new push to encircle the capital, Western officials say.

entry.title: For Some Countries, Economic Ripples of Ukraine War Bring Windfall
entry.content: Those rich in oil and gas and other commodities are expected to get a boost from soaring prices, though inflation will sting consumers and weigh on global growth.

entry.title: Ukraine Is a World Leader in Surrogacy, but Babies Are Now Stranded in a War Zone
entry.content: In the basement beneath one apartment block in Kyiv, 19 newborns lie in plastic cots, their cries mingling with the blare of air raid sirens warning of incoming Russian strikes.
